name: Lorem ipsum universal
description:
dummy text generator figma plugin.


Options

  • Create: create dummy text and TextNode together. Font installation is required because Inter font is used when creating.
  • Replace: Change the contents of a TextNode that has already been created. It is applied to the font style that the existing TextNode had. (TextNode must have one font style. (Mixed style is not supported.)


Requirements

Font installation is required because TextNodes are created when using the 'Create' option.


Lorem ipsum universal uses Inter.


Supported Language

  • Korean
  • English

If you want other language support, please leave it as GitHub Issue(or Comment) or send me PR ðŸ˜„. ðŸ™Œ
